entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
